verses.verse: Gather yourselves together<WH7197>, yea, gather together<WH7197>, O nation<WH1471> not desired<WH3700>;

Before the decree<WH2706> bring forth<WH3205>, before the day<WH3117> pass<WH5674> as the chaff<WH4671>, before<WH3808> the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> come<WH935> upon you, before the day<WH3117> of the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639> come<WH935> upon you.

Seek<WH1245> ye the LORD<WH3068>, all ye meek<WH6035> of the earth<WH776>, which have wrought<WH6466> his judgment<WH4941>; seek<WH1245> righteousness<WH6664>, seek<WH1245> meekness<WH6038>: it may be<WH194> ye shall be hid<WH5641> in the day<WH3117> of the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639>.

¶ For Gaza<WH5804> shall be forsaken<WH5800>, and Ashkelon<WH831> a desolation<WH8077>: they shall drive out<WH1644> Ashdod<WH795> at the noon day<WH6672>, and Ekron<WH6138> shall be rooted up<WH6131>.

Woe<WH1945> unto the inhabitants<WH3427> of the sea<WH3220> coast<WH2256>, the nation<WH1471> of the Cherethites<WH3774>! the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> is against you; O Canaan<WH3667>, the land<WH776> of the Philistines<WH6430>, I will even destroy<WH6> thee, that there shall be no inhabitant<WH3427>.
And the sea<WH3220> coast<WH2256> shall be dwellings<WH5116> and cottages<WH3741> for shepherds<WH7462>, and folds<WH1448> for flocks<WH6629>.

And the coast<WH2256> shall be for the remnant<WH7611> of the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>; they shall feed<WH7462> thereupon: in the houses<WH1004> of Ashkelon<WH831> shall they lie down<WH7257> in the evening<WH6153>: for the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> shall visit<WH6485> them, and turn away<WH7725> their captivity<WH7622><WH7622>.

¶ I have heard<WH8085> the reproach<WH2781> of Moab<WH4124>, and the revilings<WH1421> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>, whereby they have reproached<WH2778> my people<WH5971>, and magnified<WH1431> themselves against their border<WH1366>.

Therefore as I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Surely Moab<WH4124> shall be as Sodom<WH5467>, and the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> as Gomorrah<WH6017>, even the breeding<WH4476> of nettles<WH2738>, and saltpits<WH4379><WH4417>, and a perpetual<WH5704><WH5769> desolation<WH8077>: the residue<WH7611> of my people<WH5971> shall spoil<WH962> them, and the remnant<WH3499> of my people<WH1471> shall possess<WH5157> them.
This shall they have for their pride<WH1347>, because they have reproached<WH2778> and magnified<WH1431> themselves against the people<WH5971> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

The LORD<WH3068> will be terrible<WH3372> unto them: for he will famish<WH7329> all the gods<WH430> of the earth<WH776>; and men shall worship<WH7812> him, every one<WH376> from his place<WH4725>, even all the isles<WH339> of the heathen<WH1471>.
¶ Ye Ethiopians<WH3569> also, ye<WH1992> shall be slain<WH2491> by my sword<WH2719>.

And he will stretch out<WH5186> his hand<WH3027> against the north<WH6828>, and destroy<WH6> Assyria<WH804>; and will make<WH7760> Nineveh<WH5210> a desolation<WH8077>, and dry<WH6723> like a wilderness<WH4057>.

And flocks<WH5739> shall lie down<WH7257> in the midst<WH8432> of her, all the beasts<WH2416> of the nations<WH1471>: both the cormorant<WH6893> and the bittern<WH7090> shall lodge<WH3885> in the upper lintels<WH3730> of it; their voice<WH6963> shall sing<WH7891> in the windows<WH2474>; desolation<WH2721> shall be in the thresholds<WH5592>: for he shall uncover<WH6168> the cedar work<WH731>.

This is the rejoicing<WH5947> city<WH5892> that dwelt<WH3427> carelessly<WH983>, that said<WH559> in her heart<WH3824>, I am, and there is none beside<WH657> me: how is she become a desolation<WH8047>, a place for beasts<WH2416> to lie down in<WH4769>! every one that passeth by<WH5674> her shall hiss<WH8319>, and wag<WH5128> his hand<WH3027>.
